ComicInfo.Penciller: Curt Swan,Howard Purcell,Jerry Grandenetti,Ruben Moreira,Ruben Moreira,Howard Purcell,Jerry Grandenetti,Curt Swan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tattoos of Doom!: On the skin of Leroy, the tattooed man, pictures appear which foreshadow doom. But it's all a trick to cover up robberies.
Nemesis from the Grave!: While on a treasure hunt, Danvers murders his partner Rainier. His guilty conscience makes him see Rainier on different occasions. The police confront Danvers with an agent in a ghost suit to make him confess his crime.
Puppet's Revenge: Two puppeteers hate each other. George kills Paul in a rage, but confesses to his crime later on.
Tree of the Dead!: A date tree sprouts in New Orleans on the spot where a man has been murdered.
The Grim Jester!: A city councilman plans the demise of the mayor who refuses to buy property from him. The councilman uses the involuntary help of a practical joker, having rigged a haunted house with special gimmicks.
ComicInfo.Title: Tattoos of Doom!; Nemesis from the Grave!; Puppet's Revenge; Tree of the Dead!; The Grim Jester!
